特殊神宠论；完全忠于一种理论

word_mean_info__list.difference: 往往着重说明与同类事物不同的个别事物。如：The visitors admired his paintings, but particularly the portrait of his daughter.(来访者赞赏他所有的绘画，特别是他女儿的画像。)
一般表示某事物在意义、程度、重要性性超过其他事物。如：I love Italy, especially in summer.(我喜欢意大利，尤其在夏天。)
多表示“专门地”，“为特别目的的地”，如表“不寻常”，“过分”等，可与especially通用。如：I made chocolate cake specially for you.(我特地为你做了巧克力 蛋糕。)

bilingual.source: Explain your answer and choose three phrases you found particularly effective or interesting.
bilingual.target: 解释你的答案，并选择三个你觉得特别有效或有趣的短语。
她的眼睛特别引人注目。
这段旅程显得特别悠悠。

bilingual.source: The flu is particularly severe this year.

bilingual.target: 这本书的结局特别感人。

bilingual.source: The winter was particularly harsh this year.
bilingual.target: 今年的冬天特别严厉的。
我特别喜欢读推理小说。

bilingual.source: The northwest wind is particularly strong today.
The weather in this age was particularly cold.
bilingual.target: 这个年份的天气特别冷。

yingyinNormal.en: A woman's nose is particularly attuned to MHC molecules, which are used to fight disease.
yingyinNormal.zh: 女人的鼻子则对主要组织兼容性复合体 (MHC) 分子特别敏锐，这是用来抗病的分子。

yingyinNormal.en: As the year of the monkey is particularly important to Zhang's family, they are having some special decorations handmade.
yingyinNormal.zh: 由于猴年对张家特别重要，他们得准备一些特制手作饰品。

yingyinNormal.en: The Burj Kalifa is particularly beautiful at night, especially when viewed through Dubai Fountain's dancing waters.
yingyinNormal.zh: 晚上的哈利法塔特别优美，尤其是从迪拜喷泉跳跃的水柱之间观赏。

yingyinNormal.en: The Gavesgate is a particularly thorny rose. To prune it, start by lopping off the head and then snip away the budding shoots.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这种玫瑰花的刺特别的多，修建的时候 要先剪掉它的头，再摘掉它的花苞。

yingyinNormal.en: Particularly because it comes up with another ingredient called adaptation. And adaptation is an ingredient that we get used to things.
yingyinNormal.zh: 特别是出现了另一个称作‘适应’的成分，适应，顾名思义是我们习惯于某些事物。

yingyinNormal.en: These are the kind of little delicate compliments which are always acceptable to the ladies, and which I conceive myself particularly bound to pay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这样巧妙的恭维话一般都会让太太小姐们听得高兴，我总觉得我应该在这方面特别留意。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, actually I have to say I have already been extremely lucky, because I went to the mountains of Yunnan Province down in the south-west and saw one of the rarest animals in the world, and it was particularly pertinent for this year.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不过我得说我还真是够幸运的，因为我去了中国大西南的云南省群山，看到了世界上最稀有的动物之一，它在今年可特别扣题。

yingyinNormal.en: Why, particularly? It's not my secret to tell.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么特殊？我不方便说。

yingyinNormal.en: We've had our challenges, yes. Particularly with Russia.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们遭遇过挑战，没错，尤其是跟俄国。

yingyinNormal.en: There are three things that governments are particularly keen on.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有三个各国政府非常投入心力的目标。

yingyinNormal.en: But discount to zero is particularly influential, it's particularly be, because zero is a different price.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是折扣到零影响力更大，真是的是这样，但是0是个不一般的价格。

yingyinNormal.en: And I think for you, Peeta, it must be particularly painful.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想，对于你来说，皮塔这一定让你非常心痛。

yingyinNormal.en: He is a particularly troubled Romulan. Please. Allow me. It will be easier.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他是个麻烦的罗姆兰人，请允许我这么做，这样说起来比较快。

yingyinNormal.en: I see it within you. An unorthodox genealogy. A hybrid that seems particularly reckless.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在你身上我看到了非正统血脉。一个相当鲁莽的决定所诞生的混血儿。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay I think it's safe to say that we've all done some things we're not particularly proud of.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，我想我可以说我们都做过一些不那么光彩的事。

yingyinNormal.en: Use an amount ending in 8, which is particularly lucky in Chinese culture, and avoid the number 4.
yingyinNormal.zh: 数字必须以8结尾，这在中国的文化中被看作是非常幸运的，同时要避免使用4这个数字。

yingyinNormal.en: Escape from surveillance? One of them has proven to be particularly elusive, avoiding cameras and detection.
yingyinNormal.zh: 逃过了监控？其中一位尤其神秘莫测，避开了全部的监控侦查。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, Penny. Let me take this opportunity to point out that you are looking particularly ravishing today.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，佩妮，我借这个机会向你表达你今天看起来相当令人销魂。

yingyinNormal.en: Not because I care about you, or particularly enjoy your company, but because I need the money. I really need the money.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不是因为我关心你，或者喜欢跟你在一起，而是因为我需要钱，我真的很需要钱。

yingyinNormal.en: Another piece of advice, is that couples use separate blankets if one of the partners is a particularly restless sleeper.
yingyinNormal.zh: 另一个建议，如果情侣中有人较晚睡，可以用不同的被子。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: A number of companies, <highlight>particularly</highlight> in energy and transportation, use AI image processing technology to inspect infrastructure and prevent equipment failure or leaks before they happen.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些公司，特别是在能源和运输领域，使用人工智能图像处理技术来检查基础设施，并防止设备故障或泄漏发生。

examination_example.sentence: Defining what it means to be good parents is undoubtedly very tricky, <highlight>particularly</highlight> since children respond differently to the same style of parenting.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 定义什么是好父母无疑是非常棘手的，特别是因为孩子们对同样的教育方式有不同的反应。

examination_example.sentence: The decline in American manufacturing is a common refrain, <highlight>particularly</highlight> from Donald Trump.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国制造业的衰落是个老生常谈的问题，尤其是唐纳德•特朗普当政以来。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: to a distinctly greater extent or degree than is common

examination_example.sentence: Friendships and other important relationships become increasingly important, <highlight>particularly</highlight> during adolescence.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 友谊和其他重要关系变得越来越重要，尤其是在青春期。

examination_example.sentence: Hale wasn't just a writer, she was also a fierce social advocate, and she was <highlight>particularly</highlight> obsessed with an ideal New England.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Hale 不仅是作家，还是一位激进的社会拥护者，而且她特别痴迷于理想的新英格兰。

examination_example.sentence: The meals are not <highlight>particularly</highlight> appetising, or even safe.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 饭菜不是特别合胃口，甚至也不安全。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 特别；尤其；异乎寻常地；特别地；明确地；特别是

word_family.mean: adj. 特定的；特别的；特大的；特强烈的；苛求的；挑剔的；难以取悦的；特殊的；特称的

sense_info_list.en: to a distinctly greater extent or degree than is common

examination_example.sentence: Having a person, instead of a computer, reach out to you is <highlight>particularly</highlight> important in combating that sense of isolation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 要想战胜那份孤独感，就需要有人向你伸出援手，这一点至关重要，而不能把希望寄托在一台计算机上。

examination_example.sentence: We do still need the human touch or the human interaction, <highlight>particularly</highlight> when people are depressed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们仍然需要人人际接触或人际交往，尤其是当人们情绪低落的时候。

examination_example.sentence: In general, many lifestyle medicine physicians recommend a plant-based diet — <highlight>particularly</highlight> for people with diabetes or other inflammatory conditions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一般来说，许多生活方式医学医生建议以植物为基础的饮食，特别是对于糖尿病或其他炎症患者。

examination_example.sentence: With so many ways to communicate, how should a manager choose the one that's best <highlight>particularly</highlight> when the message to be delivered is bad or unwelcome news for the recipient?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 沟通方式如此之多，那么经理应该如何选择最佳的沟通方式？尤其是当要传递的信息对接收者而言是坏消息或不受欢迎的消息时。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence_trans: 父母，特别是那些有年幼孩子的父母，可能会教他们的孩子在某些情况下使用这种 "保护性 "谎言。

examination_example.sentence: Video is <highlight>particularly</highlight> helpful as it can be watched many times, with the presenters focusing (集中) on one part at a time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 视频是特别有帮助的，因为它可以多次观看，演示者每次都集中在一个部分。
